name: Jet Black Kiss
description:
This is Jet Black Kiss' second album. 

Harder-hitting and faster-paced than previous material, Jet Black Kiss brings authentic metal roots to full fruition.  On the escalating "Car Crash" (to be featured on Rock Band®), charged "Don't Fade Away On Me,” and ominous "We All Must Come Together," Simon showcases his signature menacing vocal timbre and pushes the tempo to urgency. Other track highlights, including a fervent “The Social Regime,” volatile “Illusions,” and free-wheeling “Psycho Baby,” layer instrumental distortions into a rousing release that will appeal to any rock purist.
